name: Cooking Hot Cooking Games
description:
Cooking Hot is the hottest and FASTEST PACED cooking game around! Cook and serve food as an international chef. The game brings you the purest and truest COOKING experiences.

In this chef game, you act as a top, star chef. The passion for food grabs you, and you’re cooking crazy, on the brink of madness. You work in kitchens across the world with all sorts of different cooking styles. TAP fast to cook various foods and serve dishes to customers.

The highly tense and coherent gameplay delivers a fascinating experience, and offers you plenty of awesome dash moments.  

We discard the fussy operations and irrelevant systems you’ll find in most cooking games on the market, and provide you with a fast-paced and simplified restaurant simulation game. Focus on your work in various restaurants and satisfy the taste buds of your customers and fans!

Download for FREE NOW and get ready to rock the cooking world!

EASY AND ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY  

The game is relaxing and very easy to play but challenging to master!  

* All the right ingredients to cook the food
* Cook in the correct order for special dishes 
* Serve food with the right side dishes
* Earn coins and tips from cooking service 
* Upgrade kitchenware and food for luxury cuisines
* Complete multiple cooking targets to pass levels 
* Open new restaurants and learn new cooking skills
* Check in daily to get rarity boosters 
* Complete daily tasks and achievements to get rewards
* Create exciting combos and win bonuses

Feel your cooking knowledge and skills grow as you play the game.
Endless fun and joy is coming!
Do you dare to challenge the most picky customers?
Will you embrace lasting cooking joy? 
Install now and start your hot cooking journey!

REALISTIC CHALLENGES AS IN REAL RESTAURANTS  

You are facing the same challenges a top chef would encounter in a real restaurant!  

* Serve the customer on time 
* Serve the correct food with the right side dishes 
* Keep an eye on the oven, don’t burn food 
* Arrange your cooking reasonably, don’t discard food
* Use time management skills
* Serve in smart dish sequence  

Use your fingers to cook delicious and fine food, and realize your cooking dream as a crazy chef. Become the hottest, star chef around and people will hear of your fame and chase you all over the world in order to taste the amazing food you cook.

UNIQUE FOOD AND RESTAURANTS  

We give you the best cooking gameplay, the best cooking experience, and the best cooking fun. Our dedicated artists give you the best kitchens, kitchenware, ingredients, and beautiful food that will tantalize your taste buds. You can:

* Feel food culture in distinctive restaurants, America, France, Italy
* Cook unique and traditional food, hotdog, steak, rib, waffle
* Mix sweet drinks, lemonade, red wine, coke, beer
* Cook breakfast, lunch, dinner, deserts and snacks
* Master all the cooking gestures, boil, fry, steam, grill

Tired of waiting for new levels in the other games? That won’t happen here. Mountains of game levels are waiting to challenge you! And we release updates regularly with new restaurants, new levels, new dishes, and fresh gameplay!

Don’t hesitate! Download and play now!

You are the cooking master customers are longing for!  

Follow our fan page to get the latest news, participate in fan page activities, and get the gifts that are only for fans. Write down your cooking diary, share game experiences with your friends, get social, and spread the cooking fun!
